attributes.action: Consider death by dangerous driving to be charged as manslaughter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming increasing common for people who kill due to dangerous/wreckless driving and/or driving under the influence of drink or drugs, to be given a lenient sentence. If they were to be charged with manslaughter (which it is) then they could be given life sentences.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
